name: Philip Rocke: Strawberry Shortcake Ice Cream (DIYorDIE Remix) [LIVE MIXING]
description:
Recipe from LIVE MIXING: Philip Rocke - Strawberry Shortcake Ice Cream
Link HERE - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v9RpdJOBbO8
diyordievaping.com/livemixing
author: ENYAWREKLAW

reviews.text: Mixed this twice, definitely needed over a week steep to be decent.  Overall nothing spectacular but not bad.

I have to say, great simple shake n vape. The ripe strawberry hits hard right after you mix it, but eases after a few puffs. The cheesecake is perfectly balanced and the choice in using FW vbic was a smart one; doesn't weigh down your palate as much as its counterparts.  This is very close to the original and the only strawberry vape that I've ever made a second bottle of. Good job.
